general.long_summary:

general.long_summary_en:
Google DeepMind team has introduced Aletheia, a specialized AI agent designed to bridge the gap between competition-level math and professional research. While models achieved gold-medal standards at the 2025 International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO), research requires navigating vast literature and constructing long-horizon proofs. Aletheia solves this by iteratively generating, verifying, and revising solutions in natural language. […]

• Une supervision humaine intensive était nécessaire pour corriger les erreurs
• Le compilateur final a réussi à compiler un noyau Linux

Cette expérience montre le potentiel des collaborations multi-agents en IA, mais souligne aussi les limites actuelles des modèles de langage sans intervention humaine.
llm.long_summary_en: The $20,000 experiment compiled a Linux kernel but needed deep human management.
